motor insurance.description: Our comprehensive motor insurance covers private cars, commercial vehicles, and two-wheelers.
motor insurance.claim_process: File claims online or call our 24/7 helpline. Most claims processed within 7 days.

health insurance.description: Comprehensive health insurance plans for individuals and families.

home insurance.description: Protect your home and belongings with our comprehensive home insurance.
home insurance.coverage: Covers fire, theft, natural calamities, and more

travel insurance.description: Travel worry-free with our domestic and international travel insurance.

claims.how to file: You can file a claim through our virtual office, mobile app, website, or by calling our 24/7 helpline at 1800-11-9100.
claims.processing time: Most claims are processed within 7-15 working days after submission of complete documents.
claims.status check: You can check your claim status online using your policy number and claim reference number.
claims.helpline: For claim assistance, call our dedicated claims helpline at 1800-11-9100 (toll-free).

services.policy renewal: Renew your policies online through our virtual office or website. Get instant renewal certificates.
services.premium calculator: Use our premium calculator to get instant quotes for various insurance products.
services.branch locator: Find the nearest Oriental Insurance branch using our branch locator tool.
services.customer support: 24/7 customer support available through phone, email, and chat.
services.grievance redressal: File grievances through our virtual office or email us at grievance@orientalinsurance.co.in

contact.head office: Oriental House, A-25/27, Asaf Ali Road, New Delhi - 110002

faq.what is insurance: Insurance is a contract that provides financial protection against specified risks in exchange for premium payments.
faq.why need insurance: Insurance protects you financially against unexpected events like accidents, illness, natural disasters, or theft.
faq.how to buy policy: You can buy policies online through our website, visit our branches, or contact our agents.
faq.premium payment methods: You can pay premiums online, through mobile banking, NEFT, cheque, or at our branches.
faq.policy cancellation: Policies can be cancelled as per terms and conditions. Cancellation charges may apply.
faq.nominee changes: Nominee details can be changed by submitting the required form and documents to our branch.

features.virtual office: Our 3D virtual office provides an immersive experience to access all insurance services from the comfort of your home.
features.ai assistant: I'm an AI-powered assistant that can help you with policies, claims, renewals, and general insurance queries.
features.interactive desks: Visit different desks in our virtual office for specific services - Policy Desk, Claims Desk, and Grievance Desk.
features.real time chat: Get instant responses to your queries through our real-time chat feature.
features.document upload: Easily upload and manage your insurance documents through our secure platform.

emergencies.accident: In case of an accident, ensure safety first, then call our emergency helpline at 1800-11-9100 for immediate assistance.
emergencies.medical emergency: For medical emergencies, contact the nearest network hospital or call our 24/7 medical helpline.
emergencies.natural disaster: Report natural disaster claims immediately through our helpline or online platform.
emergencies.theft: File a police complaint first, then report the theft claim to us with the FIR copy.
